questions.question: What will be the value of the co-ordinate whose position of a particle moving along the parabola y2 = 4x at which the rate at of increase of the abscissa is twice the rate of increase of the ordinate?

A solid cube changes its volume such that its shape remains unchanged. For such a cube of unit volume, what will be the value of rate of change of volume?
options: 3/8*(rate of change of area of any face of the cube)
3/4*(rate of change of area of any face of the cube)
3/10*(rate of change of area of any face of the cube)
3/2*(rate of change of area of any face of the cube)
